title: FS or Trade+Cash: Raw Lundgren Chicago Piedmont 150
author: jamest206

posts.post_title: FS or Trade+Cash: Raw Lundgren Chicago Piedmont 150
posts.post_content:
Hello- I have a Lundgren Chicago Piedmont 150 for sale ($750). It is raw. Front looks incredible, and back has a couple missing spots that hurt the integrity.

I would also be willing to trade this, and an Ames Piedmont 150 hands at chest for a graded Lundgren Chicago in the 1-3 range, preferably SGC (keep the wife happy with that holder).

I am flexible, feel free to email me at [url]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url] for pictures and/or offers.
